text: Scotoecus is a genus of bats in the family Vespertilionidae. ==Species== * Scotoecus albigula - white-bellied lesser house bat * Scotoecus albofuscus - light-winged lesser house bat * Scotoecus hindei - Hinde's lesser house bat * Scotoecus hirundo - dark-winged lesser house bat * Scotoecus pallidus - desert yellow bat Category:Bat genera Category:Taxa named by Oldfield Thomas
title: Scotoecus
